tool.name: get_context
tool.description: Connect your AI agents to proprietary data sources and the web using the Valyu API.

search_type.title: Search Type
search_type.description: The type of search to perform, defaults to 'all' which is proprietary data sources and the web, or 'proprietary' which is proprietary data sources only

max_num_results.title: Max Num Results
max_num_results.description: The maximum number of results to return, defaults to 10

max_price.title: Max Price
max_price.description: The maximum price to return, defaults to 10, must be greater than the max_num_results
